survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Remote Work Cybersecurity Training Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and effectiveness of the remote work cybersecurity training programs provided by the company.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the remote work cybersecurity training provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels effectively. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for ease of response.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the remote work cybersecurity training provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the cybersecurity training did you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to gather comprehensive feedback on training components.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkbox question with an optional open-ended 'Other' field.

script.question_text: Which aspects of the cybersecurity training did you find most useful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the cybersecurity training program?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Provide a text box for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the cybersecurity training program?

questions.question_text: How often do you apply the cybersecurity practices learned in the training to your daily work?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale to assess practical application of training.

script.question_text: How often do you apply the cybersecurity practices learned in the training to your daily work?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the cybersecurity training to your colleagues?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge overall recommendation likelihood.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the cybersecurity training to your colleagues?
